    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3273</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">"Mr Know All" Teacher Guide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrer-Anleitung "Herr-Know All"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guide de Professeur de "M. Know All"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Do "Guia Do Professor Sr. Saber Todo"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"Guida Dell'Insegnante Del Sig. Know All"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδηγός δασκάλων του "κ. Know All"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Guía Del Profesor De "Sr. Know All"</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A webpage with lesson plans for teaching the short story "Mr Know All". Includes links to student worksheet pages</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">short story</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Webseite mit Lektion plant für das 
Unterrichten der kurzen Geschichte "Herr Know All". Schließt 
Links zu den Kursteilnehmerbogenseiten ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une page Web avec la leçon projette pour 
enseigner l'histoire courte "M. Know All". Inclut des liens aux 
pages de tableau d'étudiant</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um Web page com lição planeia ensinando a 
história curta "Sr. Saber Todo". Inclui as ligações às 
páginas da folha do estudante</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un Web page con la lezione progetta per 
l'istruzione della storia corta "il sig. Know All". Include i 
collegamenti alle pagine del foglio di lavoro dell'allievo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα webpage με το μάθημα προγραμματίζει για τη 
διδασκαλία της σύντομης ιστορίας "ο κ. Know All". 
Περιλαμβάνει τις συνδέσεις με τις σελίδες φύλλων εργασίας 
σπουδαστών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un Web page con la lección planea para enseñar 
la historia corta "Sr. Know All". Incluye conexiones a las 
paginaciones de la hoja de trabajo del estudiante</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
